treatment.description: Plants to 70 cm. Leaves 20–60 mm, mostly 2-pinnately (1-pinnately in smaller plants) lobed (lobes 1–5 mm wide). Peduncles 20–80 mm. Phyllaries ± 8, connate at bases, oblanceolate. Ray florets ± 8. Disc florets 25+; tubes cylindro-funnelform, gradually dilated, lobes with glandular hairs. Cypselae ± 3 mm. 2n = 16.
treatment.discussion: Within populations, some individuals of Pseudobahia peirsonii have ray corollas with ultraviolet-reflective tips, others not.
